articles.author: Jessica Mathews
articles.title: DoorDash CEO Tony Xu says path to autonomous deliveries filled with 'lots of pain and suffering' but company is nearing first inning of commercial progress - Fortune
articles.description: DoorDash has been working on autonomy and robotics technology since about 2017. It's currently doing drone deliveries in Australia and securing permits for the U.S.
articles.content: Tony Xu, cofounder and CEO of food and grocery giant DoorDash, doesnt sugar coat the companys efforts, and challenges, developing autonomous delivery technologies.Candidly, its mostly been filled wit… [+2500 chars]

articles.title: AMD 25.9.1 Driver Enables FSR 4 In FSR 3.1 “DX12” Games, Expanding The List To 85+ Titles, Several Fixes & Improvements For Radeon GPUs - Wccftech
articles.description: AMD rolled out its latest Software Adrenalin Edition 25.9.1, which now enables FSR 4 for most games with FSR 3.1 support.
articles.content:
Dozens of games with FSR 3.1 support can now utilize the latest AMD FSR 4 technology to improve visual quality through the latest Adrenalin GPU driver.
Finally, you may not need to use third-party u… [+2387 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: Nobel laureate David Baltimore dead at 87 - Ars Technica
articles.description: Celebrated molecular biologist weathered late ’80s controversy to become Caltech president.
